short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colour codes crosswords on landing page based on percentage complete + adds a button that navigates to the next unstarted crossword

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions shows you at a glance how far you have progressed through all crosswords on the Guardian website. 

If the crossword has not yet been started, it will appear with a normal (white) background. Otherwise, based on what percentage you have completed each crossword, it will be colour coded from red to green.

This extension additionally adds a button called "Next Available" which will take you to the next unstarted crossword in the list, without you having to scroll through pages of completed crosswords in order to find it.
